from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from azure.storage.blob import BlobServiceClient
from azure.storage.blob import BlobClient
from notebookutils import mssparkutils

def move_daily_files_into_date_folders():

    storage_account=mssparkutils.notebook.run('/utils/py_utils_get_storage_account')
    raw_storage_container = 'abfss://odw-raw@' + storage_account

    blob_container_name = 'odw-raw'
    linked_service_name = 'ls_storage'

    # blob_account_name = 'pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb'
    # blob_relative_path = '/Fileshare/SAP_HR/Casework'
    account_url_dfs = 'https://pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/'
    account_url_blob = 'https://pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.blob.core.windows.net/'

    blob_sas_token = mssparkutils.credentials.getConnectionStringOrCreds(linked_service_name)

    blob_service_client = BlobServiceClient(account_url=account_url_blob, credential=blob_sas_token)

    container_client = blob_service_client.get_container_client(blob_container_name)

    for blob in container_client.list_blobs():
        print("Found blob: ", blob.name)
    

move_daily_files_into_date_folders()
